## Random Group Assignment
```{r eval=FALSE}
#| panel: sidebar
numericInput('seed', 'Seed', 1234567, min = 1, max = 99999999)
```
```{r eval=FALSE}
#| panel: fill
numericInput('seed', 'Seed', 1234567, min = 1, max = 99999999)
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
#| context: server
output$nameList <- renderText({ input$seed })
    seed = as.numeric(output$value)
    set.seed(seed)
    n = length(names)
    ng = n %/% 3
    permute = sample(n)
    groups = parallel::splitIndices(n, ng)
    lapply(lapply(groups, function(x) permute[x]), function(x) names[x])
```
